headline: Payslip leads as first Workday partner on Global Payroll Connect, delivering 82% time savings
summary: Payslip, the Global Payroll Control Platform, has announced the successful go-live of its customer Houlihan Lokey with Global Payroll Connect from Workday (NASDAQ: WDAY), the AI Platform for people, money and agents. Earlier this year, Payslip became the first vendor-agnostic partner to receive certification for each of the core features of Global Payroll Connect after Workday introduced the platform in November 2024. This seamless integration with Payslip has already delivered measurable result
